question: 统计每个科室的医生人数
sql: SELECT dept_id, COUNT(*) AS doctor_count FROM doctor_info GROUP BY dept_id;

question: 统计每个医院的科室数量
sql: SELECT hospital_id, COUNT(*) AS dept_num FROM department_info GROUP BY hospital_id;

question: 计算每个药品类别的药品数量
sql: SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS num FROM medicine_info GROUP BY category;

question: 查看不同职称的医生平均工资
sql: SELECT title, ROUND(AVG(salary),2) AS avg_salary FROM doctor_info GROUP BY title;

question: 统计每个医院等级下的医院数量
sql: SELECT level, COUNT(*) AS hospital_count FROM hospital_info GROUP BY level;

question: 哪些医院的医生人数超过10人？
sql: SELECT hospital_id, COUNT(*) AS num FROM doctor_info GROUP BY hospital_id HAVING num > 10;

question: 每个科室的医生人数超过5人的有哪些？
sql: SELECT dept_id, COUNT(*) AS num FROM doctor_info GROUP BY dept_id HAVING num > 5;

question: 统计药品类别中数量超过3的类别
sql: SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS num FROM medicine_info GROUP BY category HAVING num > 3;

question: 查看平均工资超过2万元的职称
sql: SELECT title, AVG(salary) AS avg_salary FROM doctor_info GROUP BY title HAVING avg_salary > 20000;

question: 统计拥有超过200张床位的医院等级
sql: SELECT level, SUM(total_beds) AS bed_sum FROM hospital_info GROUP BY level HAVING bed_sum > 200;

question: 统计每个科室的医生人数，包括未分配科室的医生
sql: SELECT IFNULL(dept_id, '未分配') AS dept_id, COUNT(*) AS num FROM doctor_info GROUP BY dept_id;

question: 统计每个药品类别的库存数量，包括类别为空的药品
sql: SELECT IFNULL(category, '未知类别') AS category, SUM(stock_quantity) AS total_stock FROM medicine_info GROUP BY category;

question: 统计每个医院的病人数量，包含未登记医院的病人
sql: SELECT IFNULL(hospital_id, '未知') AS hospital_id, COUNT(*) FROM patient_info GROUP BY hospital_id;

question: 统计护士按班次分组的人数（含空班次）
sql: SELECT IFNULL(shift, '未分配') AS shift, COUNT(*) FROM nurse_info GROUP BY shift;

question: 统计设备按维护状态分组的数量
sql: SELECT `status`, COUNT(*) AS `count` FROM `testdb`.`equipment_info` GROUP BY `status`;

question: 计算每个医院医生的平均工资和总人数
sql: SELECT hospital_id, COUNT(*) AS doctor_count, ROUND(AVG(salary),2) AS avg_salary FROM doctor_info GROUP BY hospital_id;

question: 各医院中平均工资最高的职称
sql: SELECT hospital_id, title, ROUND(AVG(salary),2) AS avg_salary FROM doctor_info GROUP BY hospital_id, title HAVING AVG(salary) = ( SELECT MAX(avg_s) FROM (SELECT hospital_id AS hid, AVG(salary) AS avg_s FROM doctor_info GROUP BY hospital_id, title) AS sub WHERE sub.hid = doctor_info.hospital_id);

question: 统计每个药品类别的平均库存量
sql: SELECT category, ROUND(AVG(stock_quantity),1) AS avg_stock FROM medicine_info GROUP BY category;

question: 按医院统计医生人数后，计算这些医院的平均医生人数
sql: SELECT ROUND(AVG(doctor_count),1) FROM (SELECT hospital_id, COUNT(*) AS doctor_count FROM doctor_info GROUP BY hospital_id) AS t;

question: 统计每个班次护士平均工资，再求所有班次的最大平均工资
sql: SELECT MAX(avg_salary) FROM (SELECT shift, ROUND(AVG(salary),2) AS avg_salary FROM nurse_info GROUP BY shift) AS tmp;

question: 统计每个医院各科室的医生数量
sql: SELECT hospital_id, dept_id, COUNT(*) AS doctor_count FROM doctor_info GROUP BY hospital_id, dept_id;

question: 统计每个医院的医生总人数
sql: SELECT hospital_id, COUNT(*) AS doctor_count FROM doctor_info GROUP BY hospital_id;

question: 统计各医院等级的平均床位数
sql: SELECT level, ROUND(AVG(total_beds),1) AS avg_beds FROM hospital_info GROUP BY level;

question: 统计每个医院等级中医院数量
sql: SELECT level, COUNT(*) AS hospital_count FROM hospital_info GROUP BY level;

question: 统计各医院中不同职称医生的平均工资
sql: SELECT hospital_id, title, ROUND(AVG(salary),2) AS avg_salary FROM doctor_info GROUP BY hospital_id, title;
